Program_Policies: A grade of C or better is required for all courses in the minor, as specified by Senate Policy 59-10. In addition, at least six credits of the minor must be unique from the prescribed courses required by a student's major(s).

Course_Title: Select 12 credits from any courses in architectural history, including at least 6 at the 400 level. No more than 9 credits may be taken from any one department. Courses must be approved by Architectural History minor adviser.
